alert.note: Alert for Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 12 at 1:12PM MDT until May 13 at 8:15PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Colorado... Arkansas River NEAR Avondale affecting Pueblo County. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Colorado... Arkansas River Near Nepesta affecting Pueblo County. For the Lower Arkansas River...including Avondale and Nepesta... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Arkansas River NEAR Avondale. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 7.8 feet, Minor Flood * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:45 PM MDT Friday the stage was 7.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 12:45 PM MDT Friday was 7.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 7.8 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 7.8 feet on 04/24/1942. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 100 AM MDT.
